benchmark_details.name: IndustryASM
benchmark_details.overview: IndustryASM is a large-scale long video dataset of industry assembly processes for temporal action segmentation and time and motion studies, comprising videos with actions and timestamps annotated by industrial engineers.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for evaluating temporal reasoning and action segmentation in long videos, particularly in industrial assembly contexts.

data.source: Industry assembly videos recorded on factory floors, manually annotated by industrial engineers.
data.size: 4,803 videos with an average duration of 119 seconds, totaling approximately 158 hours.
data.annotation: Framewise action segments annotated by industrial engineers according to actions performed.

targeted_risks.harm: Misuse of the dataset for surveillance and monitoring without consent.
